entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 9:33PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Rivers Rising Rapidly Tonight... Strong thunderstorms over the Eastern Brooks Range are causing areas of heavy rain tonight, along with frequent lightning. This rain will cause sharp rises in creeks and small rivers in the Brooks Range tonight, with larger rivers rising rapidly on Friday in the Brooks Range, and rivers north of the mountains rising on the weekend.
